title: Now playing info broken on Always On Display
content:
I am experiencing the same issue reported here:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/17058270?hl=en

But for Now Playing information. The text is "cut" in the first couple of rows of Pixels. I wonder if this is due to the shifting of pixels to prevent burn-in...

That thread was closed without a solution, that's why I'm opening this one.

I've tried clearing storage & data for Pixel Ambient Services, to no avail.

Also, my device is a 2 XL (only 2 was available in the dropdown...)

Running QQ2A.200405.005

Any help appreciated
